data.quote: Ten people who speak make more noise than ten thousand who are silent.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
data.author: Ronald Reagan

data.quote: Believe that you can do it cause you can do it.
data.author: Bob Ross

data.quote: Take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly, and try another. But by all means, try something.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it. Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe.
data.author: Bob Ross

data.quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
data.author: André Gide

data.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Never, never, never give up.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
data.author: Neil Armstrong

data.quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: We rise by lifting others.
data.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
data.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, “I’m possible!”
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the most of yourself.
data.author: Wallace D. Wattles

data.quote: ... because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
data.author: Wallace D. Wattles

data.quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
data.author: Bob Proctor, You Were Born Rich

data.quote: Be like a postage stamp. Stick to it until you get there
data.author: Bob Proctor

data.quote: Set a goal to achieve something that is so big, so exhilarating that it excites you and scares you at the same time.
data.author: Bob Proctor

data.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
data.author: Wayne Gretzky

data.quote: Impossible is a word to be found only in the dictionary of fools.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
